titles.title: Superfund Polluter Pays Act
To amend the Internal Revenue Code of 1986 to extend the financing of the Superfund.

action.text: Referred to the House Committee on Ways and Means.

bill.summary:
6/15/2015--Introduced. Superfund Polluter Pays Act
Amends the Internal Revenue Code to reinstate and extend through December 31, 2020, the Hazardous Substance Superfund financing rate and the corporate environmental income tax.
